# Intro to Basics

## R
```{r}
mpg
```

```{r}
mean(mpg$hwy)
```


```{r}
summary(mean(mpg$hwy))
```


```{r}
table(mpg$class)
```


```{r}
qplot(displ,hwy,data=mpg,color=class)
```


```{r}
lm(hwy~displ,data=mpg)
```
